QuestsSorted.NameClass: --- Start Broken Shore: Breaching the Tomb ---

/* Achievement: "Power Realized" (Unlock every Artifact Trait for a single artifact weapon) */ !Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("local id, name, points, completed, month, day, year, description, flags, icon, rewardText, isGuildAch, wasEarnedByMe, earnedBy = GetAchievementInfo(11144); return wasEarnedByMe;")
"Pillars of Creation" must be completed inside raid instance "Tomb of Sargeras" (LFR/Normal/Heroic/Mythic). Profile will turn in this quest when it completed
"The Deceiver's Downfall" must be completed and turned in inside raid instance "Tomb of Sargeras" (LFR/Normal/Heroic/Mythic)

/* Achievement: "Power Realized" (Unlock every Artifact Trait for a single artifact weapon) */ Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("local id, name, points, completed, month, day, year, description, flags, icon, rewardText, isGuildAch, wasEarnedByMe, earnedBy = GetAchievementInfo(11144); return wasEarnedByMe;")
/* Artifact Knowledge > 25 */ Lua.LuaDoString<int>("local _, level = GetCurrencyInfo('currency: 1171'); return level;") > 25
"Legionfall Supplies" required to collect "Legionfall War Supplies" x 100. Complete Broken Shore world quests. Profile will turn in this quest when objective completed
"Defending Broken Isles" required to complete any Legion Invasion scenario in Broken Isles. Profile will turn in this quest when it completed

/* Achievement: "A Glorious Campaign" (Complete your class Order Campaign) */ Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("local id, name, points, completed, month, day, year, description, flags, icon, rewardText, isGuildAch, wasEarnedByMe, earnedBy = GetAchievementInfo(10994); return wasEarnedByMe;")
"Champions of Legionfall" required you return to Order Hall and complete quest chain to recruit a new champion
/* Altar of the Aegis */ Questing.NotComplete(46244) && Quest.IsObjectiveComplete(1, 46244)
"Altar of the Aegis" must be completed in dungeon instance "Cathedral of Eternal Night" (Heroic/Mythic). Profile will turn in this quest when objective completed
--- Complete Broken Shore: Breaching the Tomb ---

EasyQuest.Name: Greater Power for Greater Threats
EasyQuest.Comment: if artifact level < 35 and next quest not recieved

EasyQuest.Name: The Broken Shore: Investigating the Legion
